title: Valley of Flowers
subtitle: Alpine bloom paradise
about: A UNESCO-protected alpine meadow famed for an unrivaled seasonal bloom of wildflowers. The Valley of Flowers is soft on the legs and heavy on the senses: color-drenched meadows, small streams, and a soundtrack of buzzing insects and mountain breezes.
seo_title: Valley of Flowers — Blooming Alpine Meadow
seo_description: UNESCO-protected valley with spectacular seasonal wildflower displays. Perfect for nature lovers and gentle treks.

trek_places.name: Ghangaria
trek_places.short: Base camp and village near the valley
trek_places.about: Ghangaria acts as the base for Valley of Flowers and Hemkund Sahib. Small guesthouses and tea stalls serve trekkers. It’s the jumping-off point for dawn visits into the meadows.
what_to_do: Visit the Valley at dawn for softer light

trek_places.name: Main Valley Meadows
trek_places.about: The heart of this trek — wide, gently sloped meadows that explode into color during monsoon. The walking is easy, but the visual intensity is high.
what_to_do: Read interpretive signs about endemic species
